00040 #include <sstream>
00041 #include "DomainVisitor.hh"
00042 
00043 using namespace TREX::transaction;
00044 
00045 std::string DomainExcept::build_message(DomainBase const &d, 
00046                                    std::string const &msg) throw() {
00047   std::ostringstream oss;
00048   oss<<"Domain "<<d.getTypeName()<<" "<<d<<" : "<<msg;
00049   return oss.str();
00050 }
00051 
00052 void DomainBase::accept(DomainVisitor &visitor) const {
00053   visitor.visit(this, true);
00054 }
00055 
00056 boost::any DomainBase::getSingleton() const {
00057   if( !isSingleton() )
00058     throw DomainAccess(*this, ": not a singleton");
00059   return singleton();
00060 }
00061 
00062 std::string DomainBase::getStringSingleton() const {
00063   if( !isSingleton() )
00064     throw DomainAccess(*this, ": not a singleton");
00065   return stringSingleton();
00066 }
